actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on N- [4- (aminocarbonyl) phenyl ]-4- [[1- [[(2, 3-dihydro -2- oxo-1H- benzimidazol -5- yl)amino] carbonyl]-2-oxopropyl]azo] benzamide.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on N-(4-(aminocarbonyl) phenyl)-4-((1(((2,3-dihydro-2-oxo-1H-benzimidazol-5-yl)amino) carbonyl)-2- oxopropyl)azo)benzamide.

titles.title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on N- [4- (aminocarbonyl) phenyl ]-4- [[1- [[(2, 3-dihydro -2- oxo-1H- benzimidazol -5- yl)amino] carbonyl]-2-oxopropyl]azo] benzamide.
